Docs.summary: Represents the HDInsight Application History Async client.

Docs.param: An application' container for which logs are needed.
The location on local disk to download the application logs.
Docs.summary: Downloads logs for a specific container within a YARN application. Logs will be downloaded to the specified download location.
Docs.returns: A task object that can be awaited to download container logs.
